modName: Main Theme Replaced - Ocarina of Time Title
summary: This simple sound mod replaces the main menu theme with \"The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time\" Title Theme.
descriptionHtml:
This simple sound mod replaces the main menu theme with \"The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time\" Title Theme.
 
*** Requested by MasoodMS ***

!!! The Legend of Zelda is property of Nintendo, I only take credit for making it the main title screen music !!!

==Installation==

I hardly doubt you need a tutorial if you\'ve been using mods for Skyrim before, but just in case, just drag the \"music\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above).
author: jamesadalpiaz
